mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_ID, STUDY_NAME, STUDY_ONLINE, STUDY_AREA, STUDY_TOPIC, STUDY_NOTICE, STUDY_COMPLETE, STUDY_LEADER, STUDY_MAX_NUMBER, STUDY_CURRENT_NUMBER, STUDY_RECRUITMENT, STUDY_REGISTER_DATE, STUDY_UPDATE_DATE FROM T_STUDY WHERE STUDY_COMPLETE = 0 AND STUDY_MAX_NUMBER != STUDY_CURRENT_NUMBER ORDER BY STUDY_REGISTER_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_STUDY(STUDY_ID, STUDY_NAME, STUDY_ONLINE, STUDY_AREA, STUDY_TOPIC, STUDY_SEARCH, STUDY_LEADER) VALUES(S_STUDY.NEXTVAL, #{studyName}, #{studyOnline}, #{studyArea}, #{studyTopic}, #{studySearch}, #{studyLeader})
mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_ID, STUDY_NAME, STUDY_ONLINE, STUDY_AREA, STUDY_TOPIC, STUDY_NOTICE, STUDY_SEARCH, STUDY_COMPLETE, STUDY_REGISTER_DATE, STUDY_UPDATE_DATE FROM T_STUDY WHERE STUDY_ONLINE = #{studyOnline} AND STUDY_AREA = #{studyArea} AND STUDY_TOPIC = #{studyTopic} AND STUDY_SEARCH = 1 AND STUDY_COMPLETE = 0
